definitions.text: a small contrasting part of something
a small area of ground covered by specific vegetation
a piece of cloth used as decoration or to mend or cover a hole
a period of indeterminate length (usually short) marked by some action or condition
examples: he was here for a little while
I need to rest for a piece

definitions.text: a short set of commands to correct a bug in a computer program
a connection intended to be used for a limited time
sewing that repairs a worn or torn hole (especially in a garment)
a protective cloth covering for an injured eye
a piece of soft material that covers and protects an injured part of the body
to join or unite the pieces of
provide with a patch; also used metaphorically
examples: The field was patched with snow

definitions.text: mend by putting a patch on
